NEW YORK ( AP ) -- Burger King is scrapping its 40 - year - old Have It Your Way slogan in favor of the more personal Be Your Way .
The chain says the new tag line will roll out across its marketing in the U.S. , including in a TV ad that will begin airing Monday night .

Fernando Machado , Burger King 's senior vice president of global brand management , noted in an interview that Have It Your Way focuses on only the transaction -- the ability to customize a burger .
By contrast , he said Be Your Way is about making a connection with a person 's greater lifestyle .
We want to evolve from just being the functional side of things to having a much stronger emotional appeal , said Machado , who joined the company in March .

Machado noted that Burger King has n't been actively using the Have It Your Way slogan for some time in the U.S. The company , which is based in Miami , Florida , also will stop using its more recent Taste Is King motto .

The chain was bought by investment firm 3G Capital in late 2010 , then taken public again in 2012 .
Soon after , 3G replaced the chain 's CEO and early this year , Axel Schwan was appointed as global chief marketing officer .
